clinical_study.brief_title: Protracted Mixture of Local Anesthetics for Major Foot and Ankle Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Protracted Mixture of Local Anesthetics for Major Foot and Ankle Surgery. A Randomized Double-blind, Controlled Study Comparing Bupivacaine-Epinephrine 0.5% Versus Bupivacaine-Epinephrine 0.5% With Dexamethasone

brief_summary.textblock: To extend the duration of peripheral nerve blockade after major foot and ankle surgery the investigators randomize the postoperative treatment with either perineurial sciatic nerve blocks with 0.5% Bupivacaine-Epinephrine with or without Dexamethasone.

primary_outcome.measure: Painfree period (time until first pain sensation in operated foot)
primary_outcome.description: Patients are closely monitored in the PACU until first pain sensation in the operated foot.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pain in the operated foot, measured on a numeric rating scale (0-10)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Every 30 minuttes from the patient enters the PACU to the nerve block wears of
secondary_outcome.description: Pain score at rest, with the operated foot elevated on a pillow, ranging from 0 [no pain] to 10 [worst possible pain]

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensibility score, measured with a hided tactile pinprick-sensation under the 3.rd toe on the operated foot
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Every 30 minutes from the patient enters the PACU to the sensations core reach 2
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivy score measured on a 3 point scale 0 (no sensation) (impared sensation) 2 (full or normal sensation) compared to non-operated side

secondary_outcome.measure: Total consumption of opioids during the length of stay
secondary_outcome.description: A cummulative calculation of equipotente doses of oral milligrams of morphin during the length of stay

secondary_outcome.measure: quality of sleep first night measured on a 3 point scale
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of sleep measured on the morning after operation. 0 (good sleep, no interruptions) by pain from operated foot) 1 (sleep, but interruption without pain) 2 (sleep but interrupted by pain from operated foot)

arm_group.description: Bupivacaine + Adrenaline Sciatic nerve block with Bupivacaine 0.5% + Epinephrine 5 microg/ml
Bupivacine + Adrenaline + Dexamethasone Sciatic nerve block with Bupivacaine 0.5% + Epinephrine 5 microg/ml PLUS Dexamethsone 8 mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age > 17
- scheduled major foot and ankle surgery
- written informed consent
- fertile women in anti conceptive treatment
- fertile women not in anti conceptive treatment, but with negative urin-HCG on day of surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients not able to understand or cooperate
- allergies to medicines involved
- daily buse of steroids
- daily use of opioids
